```{r}
data("EuStockMarkets")
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(EuStockMarkets, aes(y=DAX, x=time(EuStockMarkets))) +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
#| message: false
```{r}
EuStockMarkets <-
  EuStockMarkets|> as_tibble() |>mutate(date = time(EuStockMarkets))
```

```{r}
ggplot(EuStockMarkets, aes(x = date, y = DAX)) +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
ggplot(EuStockMarkets, aes(x=date, y=CAC)) +
  geom_line(colour = 'steelblue') +
  geom_line(mapping=aes(y=DAX), colour='salmon')
```
```{r}
EuStockMarkets |>
  pivot_longer(!date, names_to = "index") |>
  ggplot(aes(x=date, y=value,colour = index))+ 
  geom_line()

```
